QuoteLineWorkSource.name: QuoteLineWorkSource
QuoteLineWorkSource.description: Represents an association between a quote and work sources, such as assets, quote line items, order products, or work type groups.

AssetId.description: The asset associated with the quote work source.

OrderItemId.description: The order product associated with the quote work source.

QuoteId.description: The quote associated with the quote work source.

QuoteLineItemId.description: The quote associated with the quote work source.

WorkTypeGroupId.description: The quote associated with the work source
